devdoc.details: A smart contract for creating random packets with various reward types Supports multiple randomness sources and packet types

cancelExpiredPacket(uint256).details: Cancel an expired packet and refund creator

createETHPacket(uint256,uint256[]).details: Create a simple ETH packet with block hash randomness

createMixedPacket(uint8[],uint256[],addr.details: Create a mixed packet with commit-reveal randomness

createTokenPacket(address,uint256[],bool.details: Create a token packet with VRF randomness

openPacket(uint256).details: Open a packet using block hash randomness

devdoc.title: RandomPacket
